Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49990 affecting package espeak-ng for versions less than 1.51.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-49990 affecting package espeak-ng for versions less than 1.51.1-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package espeak-ng is earlier than 1.51.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-49990
